name: Jeanne d'Arc
description: A spark of hope for the French people, Jeanne d'Arc takes to the battlefield and inspires courage to her followers. Starting as a humble villager, Jeanne begins the Journey of a Hero in the Dark Age. Experience forges Jeanne into a powerful leader, gaining access to trusted companions and powerful abilities which shape the empire she was destined to create.
descriptionCN: 贞德是法兰西人的希望之火，她走上战场，鼓舞了追随者们的勇气。贞德从一个卑微的村民开始了黑暗时代的英雄之旅。经验将贞德锻造成一位强大的领袖，她获得了值得信赖的同伴和强大的能力，这一切塑造了她注定要创建的帝国。

overview.title: Civilization Bonuses
list: Jeanne d'Arc navigates the Journey of a Hero.
Royal Knights in the Feudal Age (II).
Trade Posts are revealed on the minimap.
Traders can return Food, Wood, or Gold to Markets.

overview.title: Journey of a Hero
overview.description:
Jeanne d'Arc is present on the battlefield. A heroic unit who gains experience for completing tasks such as gathering resources, constructing buildings, and participating in combat.
After accruing enough experience, Jeanne may level up to obtain powerful economic and combat abilities.

overview.title: Royal Stallions
overview.description: Deploy the Royal Knight in the Feudal Age (II) and research powerful unique technologies for cavalry.

overview.title: Galvanized Economy
overview.description: The people work harder under Jeanne d'Arc's leadership. Economic upgrades are 35% cheaper.

overview.title: Trade Economy
overview.description:
Choose to return Food, Wood, or Gold to Markets with Traders and Trade Ships.
Trade Ships return +20% more resources.
Trade Posts are revealed on the minimap at the start of the game.
Docks provide populations space.

overview.title: Unique Units
overview.description:
Jeanne d'Arc: A hero unit that starts as a villager, Jeanne begins the Journey of a Hero to gain powerful abilities.
Jeanne's Rider: Fast Cavalry effective at raiding, flanking, and countering Crossbows, becomes available once Jeanne achieves level 3.
Jeanne's Champion: Tough infantry that excels at countering Spearmen, becomes available once Jeanne achieves level 3.
Royal Knight: Heavy Cavalry that gains +3 bonus damage for 5 seconds after completing a charge.
Arbalétrier: Crossbowman with +1 melee armor that can deploy a defensive Pavise to provide +5 ranged armor and +1 weapon range for 30 seconds.
Cannon: Bombard replacement with more damage, mobility and no setup time.
Galleass: Large war galley that has a long range forward mounted bombard.
War Cog: Unique Springald Ship with reduced cost and increased pierce armor.

overviewCN.title: 文明加成
list: 圣女贞德开始英雄之旅。
封建时代 (第二时代) 的皇家骑士。
贸易站显示在小地图上。
商人可以将食物、木材、黄金送回市场。

overviewCN.title: 英雄之旅
overviewCN.description:
圣女贞德出现在战场。这是一种可以通过完成任务来获得经验值的英雄单位，例如收集资源、建造建筑和参加战斗等任务。
获得足够的经验值后，贞德可以升级以获得强大的经济和战斗能力。

overviewCN.title: 皇家战马
overviewCN.description: 在封建时代 (第二时代) 中可部署皇家骑士，并可研究强大的独特骑兵科技。

overviewCN.title: 激励经济
overviewCN.description: 人民在圣女贞德的领导下更努力地工作。经济升级成本降低 35%。

overviewCN.title: 贸易经济
overviewCN.description:
选择使用商人和商船将食物、木材、黄金带回市场。
商船带回的资源量额外 +20%。
在游戏开始时于小地图上显示贸易站。
码头提供人口空间。

overviewCN.title: 独特单位
overviewCN.description:
圣女贞德：初始状态为村民的英雄单位，贞德开始通过英雄之旅获得强大能力。
贞德的骑兵：在突袭、侧翼攻击和克制弩手时非常有效的快速骑兵，当贞德达到第 3 级时可用。
贞德的冠军剑士：擅长应对长矛兵的强壮步兵，当贞德达到第 3 级时可用。
皇家骑士：这种重装骑兵单位在完成冲锋后的 5 秒内获得 +3 的伤害加成。
弓弩手：这种弩手单位拥有 +1 的近战护甲，并可以部署一面防御用的大盾，提供 +5 远程护甲和 +1 武器攻击范围，持续 30 秒。
加农炮：这种替代手推炮的单位可以造成更多伤害，机动性更高，而且无需架设时间。
三桅战船：拥有前置远程手推炮的大型战舰。
柯克战船：独特的扭力弩炮船，成本更低，护甲穿透能力更强。
